results.title: New potential for an old kid on the block: Impact of premorbid metformin use on lactate kinetics, kidney injury and mortality in sepsis and septic shock, an observational study
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has pleomorphic effects that may be beneficial in @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@, but at present, the impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure on @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ remains controversial.
